programme.title: Live: NFL Countdown
programme.desc: Highlights from previous week's action in the National Football League.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The NFC South-leading Buccaneers host the Cardinals for a clash of clubs seeking to snap three-game slides. Tampa Bay quarterback Baker Mayfield injured his left non-throwing shoulder in a 34-7 setback against the Los Angeles Rams in Week 12.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: Sam Darnold faces a former team as his Seahawks welcome the Vikings to Lumen Field. Darnold went 14-4 with Minnesota in 2024, including a 27-24 victory at Seattle. Jaxon Smith-Njigba (SEA) comes off a season-high 167 receiving yards and two TD grabs.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.title: Live: College Football Scoreboard
programme.desc: Presenting up-to-the-minute scores and highlights during the college football season.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The unbeaten Aggies line up against the Longhorns in a Lone Star Showdown tilt. Texas A&M finds itself in the driver's seat for both an SEC title-game appearance and College Football Playoff berth after starting 11-0 for the first time since 1992.

programme.title: Live: College GameDay
programme.desc: Originating from the site of one of the day's best matchups, with a sea of fans cheering wildly in the background, host Rece Davis and analysts Lee Corso, Kirk Herbstreit and Desmond Howard talk college football for three hours, reporting on the top teams, games, players and storylines. David Pollack and Maria Taylor contribute reports, interviews and features. Davis replaced longtime host Chris F

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Panthers (8-3, 6-1) host the Hurricanes (9-2, 5-2) in a clash of ACC title game contenders. Pitt needs a victory, and a loss by SMU or Virginia to play for the championship. Miami must win, and have Virginia Tech win or Duke lose.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Sooners (9-2, 5-2 SEC) surge into a regular-season finale with the Tigers (7-4, 3-4). Oklahoma has won three straight games, all against Top 25 teams, and would all but assure itself a spot in the College Football Playoff by beating LSU.

programme.title: Live: College Football Scoreboard
programme.desc: Presenting up-to-the-minute scores and highlights during the college football season.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: SEC rivals in the Crimson Tide (9-2, 6-1) and Tigers (5-6, 1-6) meet in the Iron Bowl. Alabama leads the series 51-37-1. The Crimson Tide will earn a berth in the SEC championship game if they beat the Tigers for the sixth straight time.

programme.desc: Psychedelics may be the future of mental health treatment in sports. E60 follows a group of former athletes with a range of mental and physical conditions as they take part in a medical retreat involving psilocybin, aka Magic Mushrooms.
